name: Champions of Demah
blurb: An RTS/3rd Person action hybrid multiplayer game set in the fantasy world of Demah. With up to 32 players online. For Windows & Mac.

rewards.reward: No Reward

Tier 1: BANNER-MAN - £1
==============================
Rewards
==============================
Every pledge is important, For backing our project we will produce a video stating our appreciation for all your support and how much it means to NRD.

Tier 2: FOLLOWER - £5 
==============================
Rewards - Includes Tier 1
==============================
As a Follower, you will receive special forum access, and a icon for your profile to display that you support Champions of Demah.

Tier 3: Early Bird ADVOCATE - £15
==============================
Rewards - Includes Tiers 1 & 2
==============================
This is an Early Bird Reward. 250 Limit!
==============================
Digital Game - As an Early Bird Advocate, you will receive a digital copy of Champions of Demah for a lower pledge amount.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Early Access - You will be able to download and play the game 2 weeks earlier.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Kickstarter Banner - You will recieve a special banner to display in your domain. Not to worry, its a special slot that does not take over your standard banner. So you can show your pride in supporting us.

Tier 4: ADVOCATE - \u00a320 ============================== Rewards - Includes Tiers 1 & 2 ============================== \r\nDigital Game - You will receive a digital copy of Champions of Demah. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ \r\nEarly Access - You will be able to download and play the game 2 weeks earlier. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Kickstarter Banner - You will recieve a special banner to display in your domain. Not to worry, its a special slot that does not take over your standard banner. So you can show your pride in supporting us.

Tier 5: APOSTLE - £25
==============================
Rewards - Includes Tiers 1, 2 & 4
==============================
Beta Access - You will receive access to a beta, to be released between August & December
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Beta Banner - For your support at this level, as well as being involved in the beta. You will be rewarded a Beta Banner, to display in your domain.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Beta Forum Access - You will have a special access to a forum, for all beta testers, to propose changes and alterations and aid us in making this the best game possible.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Credit - All Beta testers will get a named mention (if you like) in the games official credits. We also, will back good contributing beta testers for their efforts, by officially stating your beta testing as a position in NRD. So you may beta test other games with our support.

Tier 6: The KNIGHT - £35
==============================
Rewards - Includes Tiers 1, 2, 4 & 5
==============================
Silver Knight + Magma Knight - You will receive a special DLC for Champions of Demah. The DLC will provide 2 alternative backer armours for all 9 classes.

Tier 7: The CHAMPION - £40
==============================
Rewards - Includes Tiers 1, 2, 4, 5 & 6
==============================
Gold Knight + Obsidian Knight - You will receive a special DLC for Champions of Demah. The DLC will provide 2 alternative backer armours for all 9 classes.

Tier 8: The LORD - £45
==============================
Rewards - Includes Tiers 1, 2, 4 - 7
==============================
Kickstarter Cloak - You shall receive a special cloak, only backers of this level and higher will be able to wear cloaks. Cloaks are a future planned Update/DLC. Backers will get a special Cloak design and shoulder-pads.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kickstarter Statue - You will receive a knightly statue for your domain. Displaying your name as a backer on the base.

Tier 9: SEEKER - £50
==============================
Rewards - Includes Tiers 1, 2, 4 - 8
==============================
Digital Collector Edition - You shall get the digital collectors edition of Champions of Demah. Which includes a digital artbook showing some of the concepts, renders and visual designs done for COD. The edition also includes a digital soundtrack containing all the music done for COD.

Tier 10: STANDARD BEARER - S - £75
==============================
Rewards - Includes Tiers 1, 2, 4 - 9
==============================
USB - You will receive a special COD USB drive, containing the install files for Champions of Demah, as well as the digital goods of the previous tier.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
T-Shirt - A T-shirt of Champions of Demah. Upon completion we will request the size of the shirt you require, so you may wear it in all your pride.
==============================
You may only select either Tier 10 or 11.

Tier 11: STANDARD BEARER - P - £75
==============================
Rewards - Includes Tiers 1, 2, 4 - 9
==============================
USB - You will receive a special COD USB drive, containing the install files for Champions of Demah, as well as the digital goods of the previous tier.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Poster - You will receive a special poster, to display your support for Champions of Demah.
==============================
You may only select either Tier 10 or 11.

Tier 12: PRO BEARER - T - £100
==============================
Rewards - Includes Tiers 1, 2, 4 - 9
==============================
Banner Towel - You will receive a special kickstarter banner towel. Full size.
==============================
You may only select either Tier 12 or 13.

Tier 13: PRO BEARER - B - £100
==============================
Rewards - Includes Tiers 1, 2, 4 - 9
==============================
Signed Artbook - You will receive a brilliantly printed artbook containing signed works and thank you messages from the staff.
==============================
You may only select either Tier 12 or 13.

Tier 14: COLLECTOR - Silver - £150
==============================
Rewards - Includes Tiers 1, 2, 4 - 9
==============================
Collectors Edition - You will get a boxed collectors edition of the game, which includes a full size Poster, The Champions of Demah Art book, Map of the world of Demah, Soundtrack and a set of DLC Armour specially designed for collectors.
==============================
You may only select either Tier 14 or 15.

Tier 15: COLLECTOR - Gold - £200
==============================
Rewards - Includes Tiers 1, 2, 4 - 9
==============================
Collectors Edition - You will get a boxed collectors edition of the game, which includes a full size Poster, The Champions of Demah Art book, Map of the world of Demah, Soundtrack and a set of DLC Armour specially designed for collectors.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
3D Printed Figure - This version of the collectors edition includes a special 3D Printed model from the game.
==============================
You may only select either Tier 14 or 15.

Tier 16: The SEEN - £300
==============================
Rewards - Includes Tiers 1, 2, 4 - 9
==============================
Game Likeness - We will put your likeness in the game on an NPC. NPC characters are 3rd party teams, that guard strategic locations through the maps.

Tier 17: The CHARACTER - £500
==============================
Rewards - Includes Tiers 1, 2, 4 - 9
==============================
NPC Naming - We will name a NPC after you in the game. The NPC shall be one of the 3rd Party teams in the map, that defend strategic and important points.

Tier 18: PLACE MASTER - £600
==============================
Rewards - Includes Tiers 1, 2, 4 - 9
==============================
Place Naming - We will name a place inside the maps after you. The places will be forts, areas of the map, bridges any many other cool buildings.

Tier 19: MAP MASTER - £1000
==============================
Rewards - Includes Tiers 1, 2, 4 - 9
==============================
Map Naming - The name of the Map shall be named after you, you will get your name on 1 of the playable maps that thousands of people will see.

Tier 20: The FORGEMASTER - £1500
==============================
Rewards - Includes Tiers 1, 2, 4 - 9
==============================
Design a Weapon - You will conduct remote conference sessions, and assist from start to finish in the design of a weapon for any class in the game you wish. The weapon will be put in as DLC.

Tier 21: CURATOR OF DEMAH - £5,000
==============================
Rewards - Includes Tiers 1, 2, 4 - 9
==============================
Come to Sweden! Thats right, we will invite, help pay for the trip and you will get involved with our design team to come up with something for the game. You will work with us, eat with us and enjoy 1 week of game development experience.
Design weapons, armour, map or anything you like to put in the game.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
We will pay for the the hotel, accommodation expenses as well as any travel required in Sweden. You should pay for the flight and food expenses, except when we eat together. NRD Covers that ;)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Visas may or may not be required.
